kpi.name: M8013C12

kpi_info.title: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Other causes
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated transitions to the ECM-IDLE state due to Other causes. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter

kpi.kpi_alias: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Other causes
